events.name: FOSSASIA + GitHub + Grumpy Gits = Patchwork!
events.description: NOTE: This event is part of FOSSASIA 2016. Attendees must register here in order to attend (discount code: WELOVEGIT). Git and GitHub Workshop Mike McQuaid, maintainer of the Homebrew package manager and Platform engineer at GitHub will be at hand to help you create your first open source project. This is a self-directed and hands-on workshop for people who want to learn Git, GitHub, or GitHub Pages. You’ll leave with a merged Pull Request, a square on your contributions graph, and confidence to get more involved in the open source community. If you’re an experienced GitHub user, we’d love for you to join the session as a mentor.
events.location: Singapore Science Center, 15 Science Center Rd

events.name: Keysigning at FOSSASIA
events.description: We are organizing a key-signing event and possibly an informal CryptoParty at FOSSASIA. We will gather around at 14:00 on Sunday at the exhibition area. For more info: https://www.cryptoparty.in/singapore You are all welcome!
events.location: Science Centre, 15 Science Centre Road , Singapore

events.name: FOSSASIA After-Event Hacking, Coding, Relaxing at Hackerspace.sg OpenXLab
events.description: Didn't get enough of techie stuff? Want to work on this awesome project you found at FOSSASIA? Met some amazing developers at the weekend? Join us for the FOSSASIA After-Event hacking, coding, relaxing at Hackerspace.sg OpenXLab on Sunday evening. There are lots of night food places around as well and whatever is left over after FOSSASIA we will enjoy it here. Hakerspace Singapore: https://hackerspace.sg
